description: Carex 'Silver Sceptre' is an eye-catching sedge that is sure to make an impact in any garden. It forms elegant, clumping mounds of long, thin foliage that are prominently marked with creamy yellow stripes throughout. Its striking appearance is enhanced by fine-textured flowering stems that reach nearly 2ft tall and are adorned with delicate, silver-tinged spikes of tan flowers. This stunning sedge thrives in moist, shady areas and requires minimal care once established. It is an ideal choice for borders, woodland gardens, and rock gardens. Carex 'Silver Sceptre' is an excellent addition to landscape, offering seasonal interest and low maintenance.
